QuestData.Title: The Shado-Pan Offensive
QuestData.Description: We Shado-Pan have amassed our forces for the first time in many ages.$B$BThe Sha of Hatred has escaped beyond the Serpent's Spine, and it is our sacred duty to imprison it once more.$B$BHowever, our warriors are great, but our numbers too few. Help from a capable $c may not be turned away.$B$BIf you wish to join the offensive, speak to Taran Zhu in the Townlong Steppes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Taran Zhu at Longying Outpost in the Townlong Steppes.
